 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּץ‎</span> **proper name** 

**1. masculine a.** (eldest) 'son' of Aram [[Gen.10.23|Gen 10:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), = 'son' of Shem [[1Chr.1.17|1Chr 1:17]], [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ως</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> Chronicles <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ουζ</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** eldest 'son' of Nahor [[Gen.22.21|Gen 22:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[BDB#A|A]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ωξ</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ωζ</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** Edomite name [[Gen.36.28|Gen 36:28]] = [[1Chr.1.42|1Chr 1:42]], [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ως</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ους</span> 

**2. location** (= 

**1. a, b**, possibly also **c**), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְכֵי אֶרֶץ הָעוּץ‎</span> [[Jer.25.20|Jer 25:20]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] omitted); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֶרֶץעֿוּץ‎</span> [[Job.1.1|Job 1:1]] (home of Job), [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Αυσιτις</span>; [[Lam.4.21|Lam 4:21]] (strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּץ‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] and references); on Uz as vague name for east country see especially [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]<sup>ix. f.</sup>; [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pa 259, ZKF ii. 87 ff.</sup> puts in Hauran, or north (northeast) therefrom, = Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Uƒƒu***</u></abbr>, but dubious with name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּץ‎</span> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 261</sup> compare Arabic proper name, of divinity. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, so [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2, 146</sup>; against this [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi (1886), 183 f.</sup>, but see reply [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 43</sup>.
